description:
Successfully stopping Kagakagari`s ritual that would have killed the city`s demons, Tomoharu returns to regular school life. Aine`s bouyant mother Kirie invites Tomoharu to a party to celebrate the anniversary of her daughter`s death in cheerful fashion. Much to everyone`s surprise, Kirie describes the late Aine as boisterous and mischievous, and Reishiro and Reiko`s pasts are revealed. With these thoughts on their minds, the party goes on...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ordinary and Extraordinary That Is Here with Us
Tonari ni Ite Kureru Nichijou to Hinichijou
隣にいてくれる日常と非日常
